association.heading: The Association
association.body:
Our Mission

KalkConnect e.V. is a non-profit association based in Cologne. Our goal is to promote civic engagement in political education, integration and culture, focusing on empowering socially disadvantaged people.

Our Vision

The association serves as a platform for encounters, information exchange, counselling, mutual support and engagement promotion.

Our Work

Through educational work and public projects we highlight social inequality and encourage people to actively shape social processes. Core activities are cultural events, training seminars, political project groups and open spaces for exchange.

Our Values

The association is non-partisan and non-denominational. KalkConnect e.V. works selflessly and uses its funds exclusively for charitable purposes.

donate.heading: Donate
donate.body:
Why Your Support Matters

KalkConnect e.V. wishes to remain independent of governmental, political, religious and institutional influence. Its work is financed solely by donations from supporters as well as educational and consulting services.

How You Can Help

Would you like to support our work and promote participation and equality in the district? We greatly appreciate your donation. Monthly standing orders help us plan reliably.

Donation Receipts

As a recognized non-profit organization, we are happy to provide you with a donation receipt for your tax return. Please send us your complete address by email.

cards.title: Consulting
cards.text: We advise on political engagement, citizen participation and socio-political topics in the district.

cards.title: Community Work
cards.text: Open social activities such as shared meals, film screenings or excursions bring people together.

cards.title: Networking
cards.text: We connect people and groups in Cologne-Kalk and support initiatives.

cards.title: Educational Offers
cards.text: Lectures, trainings and adult education on international, feminist and current topics.
